import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import './ProductDisplay.css'; import star_icon from '../assets/star_icon.png'; import star_dull_icon from '../assets/star_dull_icon.png'; import { ShoesContext } from '../../context/ShoesContext'; const ProductDisplay = (props) => { const {product} = props; const {addToCart} = useContext(ShoesContext); return (

{product.name}

(122)

${product.old_price}
${product.new_price}
A lightweight, usually knitted, pullover shirt, close-fitting and with a round neckline and short sleeves, worn as an undershirt or garment.

Select Size

S
M
L

XX1

Category : Woman, T-Shirt, Crop Top

Tags : Modern, Latest

) }; export default ProductDisplay
